title: Van der Poel Braces for Pogačar Attacks, Pidcock with ‘One Shot to Win,’ Lamperti Hits Another Podium
content:
Lamperti kicks to 2nd in Koksijde Classic, Van der Poel and Philipsen know what to expect from Pogačar, and Pidcock saving his bullets for one shot to win Milan-San Remo.

Read the full article at Van der Poel Braces for Pogačar Attacks, Pidcock with ‘One Shot to Win,’ Lamperti Hits Another Podium on Velo.
author: ahood
